items.sentence: Tom will only be in Boston a couple of weeks.
Tom got carried off the field on a stretcher.
Tom is lucky he didn't get seriously injured.
Tom is the one who told me to read this book.
Tom was the one that came up with the design.
Tom is the only one that knows where Mary is.
Tom missed the bus and had to walk to school.
Tom ran back home to get something he forgot.
Tom was the one who suggested I buy this one.
I can't put up with your behavior any longer.
Have you ever been diagnosed with hemophilia?
It looks like you have the same problem I do.
We're going to need to find a new place soon.
This river looks like it's going to overflow.
I think that maybe I should talk to a lawyer.
Tom probably isn't going to agree to do that.
Tom probably isn't going to be busy tomorrow.
Tom probably isn't going to do that tomorrow.
Tom probably isn't going to let Mary do that.
Tom is probably not ever going to walk again.
